title: When is the D really worth it?
body:
:^)

For real though, in your KDA, do you ever have higher than normal deaths and think "worth!" And if so, how important is not dying to you?

I've had a few games where I had a lot of deaths, but they were good, productive deaths like a baron steal, or a 3-1 turret dive. I am usually really cautious, so I rarely die, but if I see a dicey situation I could flip by potentially doing something and probably die as a result, I am pretty quick to pull that trigger.

When is the D really worth it?
